description: Try our easy to follow Roasted Capsicums And Cheese recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian
name: Roasted Capsicums And Cheese Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small red onion, cut into 8 wedges
2 runner beans, trimmed and cut into small batons

recipeInstructions.text: Place the pepper halves in a roasting tin and divide the other vegetables and the garlic between them.
Sprinkle with the oil and cumin seeds, season with salt and pepper and bake in a preheated oven, 200°C for 25 minutes.
Crumble over some feta or goats cheese to serve.
